author: rdonkin
msg: MIME4J-35 Split BodyDescriptor into a mutable / immutable interface pair (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MIME4J-35). Contributed by Oleg Kalnichevski. Amended by myself: renamed ContentProperties -> ContentDescriptor for consistency.

author: jkuhnert
msg: Fixes TAPESTRY-2120.  Radio component needed to override setName(IForm form) to prevent id allocation of individual radio elements as the naming is still supposed to be managed by the containing RadioGroup.
